General.Name: Young Poong Pa
General.Description: Young Poong Paper Mfg Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells paper products. It offers core boards that are used in manufacturing paper cores and tubes; and liner boards for use in manufacturing corrugated boards and boxes. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Pyeongtaek, South Korea. Young Poong Paper Mfg Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Daiyang Metal Co., Ltd..
